# Prompt Injection Evaluator

## Project Overview
Python 3.13 project for evaluating prompt injection vulnerabilities.

## Project Structure
- `src/main.py` - Main application entry point
- `tests/test_main.py` - Unit tests
- `requirements.txt` - Project dependencies (requests, pytest, pytest-cov)
- `.venv/` - Virtual environment (Python 3.13.3)

## Setup Complete
- [x] Created project structure
- [x] Configured Python virtual environment
- [x] Installed dependencies
- [x] Verified project runs successfully
- [x] All tests passing

## Running the Project
```bash
.venv/bin/python src/main.py
```

## Running Tests
```bash
.venv/bin/python -m pytest tests/ -v
```
